Other Links on Fiscal Transparency

A range of multilateral institutions and NGOs has been working on Fiscal Transparency issues. For example:

CalPERS (Oxford Analytica reports)
Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative (EITI)
Open Budget Initiative (OBI)
OECD - Best Practices for Budget Transparency (pdf file)
OECD - Public Governance and Management
Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability (PEFA)
The Center for Public Integrity
Transparency International (TI)
World Bank – Budget Laws
World Bank Public Sector Governance
Public Financial Management Blog
